product_name: Moving Comfort Sprint Tech Skort - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Yes, it's cute and comfortable, but make no mistake; the Moving Comfort Sprint Tech Skort means business. Stay-put shorts and an overskirt let you run, lift weights or spin without thinking twice. Soft, breathable stretch-polyester inner shorts wick moisture away from skin so you stay comfortable even if you start to sweat; compression fit keeps shorts from riding up. Outer skirt wicks moisture and features a blend recycled polyester and spandex; fabric feels nearly identical to inner shorts. Skort features a wide, flat waistband with internal drawcord for a smooth, secure fit. Rear zip pocket and internal security pocket store small essentials such as key, ID or energy gel. Moving Comfort Sprint Tech Skort features side drawcords that reveal the printed shorts underneath when cinched. Closeout.
short_description: Yes, it's cute and comfortable, but make no mistake; the Moving Comfort Sprint Tech Skort means business. Stay-put shorts and an overskirt let you run, lift weights or spin without thinking twice.
